item.title: RT by @PhilJamesson: 34. The Hamlet Factory 9/10 I absolutely loved this mini series. It‚Äôs super short, but super sweet. As someone who absolutely loves Infinite Monkey Theorem, an office comedy about it was right up my alley. I would love to see more, but for now, PLEASE check this out!!
item.dc:creator: @kobek5623
item.description:
34. The Hamlet Factory 9/10
I absolutely loved this mini series. It‚Äôs super short, but super sweet. As someone who absolutely loves Infinite Monkey Theorem, an office comedy about it was right up my alley. I would love to see more, but for now, PLEASE check this out!!

item.title:
R to @PhilJamesson: all art and animation-- that's right, ALL of it-- done by the extremely skilled @drawckie. she turned our (often inscrutable) basic ideas into real art
thanks to @cheesepapa for believing in the project, to @adultswim and to @hbomax.
http://linktr.ee/thehamletfactory

item.title: R to @PhilJamesson: phil is explicitly anti-work. jeremy desperately wants to write hamlet. and cindy (@nwalks) almost has-- multiple times.
item.dc:creator: @PhilJamesson
item.description: phil is explicitly anti-work. jeremy desperately wants to write hamlet. and cindy (@nwalks) almost has-- multiple times.

item.title:
you've heard that if you put infinite monkeys on infinite typewriters, eventually, they'll produce the entire works of william shakespeare? well, this is the office where that happens.
created by myself and @jeremysmiles, all three episodes are out now on hbo max.
item.dc:creator: @PhilJamesson

item.title: on warm nights like these, they say if you listen closely, you can hear the sound of your car being stolen. dont go look though. its totally fine in the driveway, Greg
item.dc:creator: @PhilJamesson
item.description: on warm nights like these, they say if you listen closely, you can hear the sound of your car being stolen. dont go look though. its totally fine in the driveway, Greg

item.title:
"hbo! hbo! HBO! HBO!" my roommates chant as i sweat, holding the remote. i wipe my brow and press a button.
a thick silence.
the Hulu logo pops up. i close my eyes and a tear falls down my cheek as they unsheath their weapons
item.dc:creator: @PhilJamesson
item.description:
"hbo! hbo! HBO! HBO!" my roommates chant as i sweat, holding the remote. i wipe my brow and press a button.

a thick silence.

the Hulu logo pops up. i close my eyes and a tear falls down my cheek as they unsheath their weapons
